metadata.name: Impermanence #1/100
metadata.description:
Impermanence is the nature of our world. While all of existence is in perpetual flux, the only constant is the present moment. The reflections and realizations of today ground us and give us clarity and conviction for the many passing stages of our individual growth.  

This real-time dynamic NFT reflects meteorological conditions, time of day, and relative temperature in your specific location. In partnership with Transient Labs, this first-of-its-kind NFT is my most ambitious and distinctive piece to date.  

[View Fullscreen](https://projects.transientlabs.xyz/ipfs/QmbuzcXtUK1c1N9WZ2UTeL2zYgnjvdi6ocQW3BigqSviQn)
